content: आकर्षण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Attracting, carrying to another place. --णं {@--1@} Pulling, drawing, attracting. {@--2@} Seduction. --णी {@--1@} A curved stick for pulling down fruits, flowers &c. (standing on elevated places); any instrument for pulling. {@--2@} A variety of Mudrā (or mark on the body).
